body:
Comment 3: 
Here is a simpler case


package main

type T int
func (t T) Meth()
var t *T

type P *T
var p P

func main() {
	t.Meth()
	p.Meth()
}

The error printed is definitely wrong but I don't
know whether it is the error message wording
or the fact that there is an error at all that is 
the wrong part.

+gri
